attributes.review: This app is horrible!! Not only is it hard to use and access, but it’s very unorganized and kept glitching! On top of that, it took 3 days to load on my phone🙄🙄this app gives me nightmares. Worst app ever.
attributes.title: I’m appalled by how terrible this app is!!😤🙄🙄😡

attributes.review: The app would kick me out every time I tried to run it  it would play music when I would exit the app brought many rodents into my house hold will not recommend save you time !!!!!
attributes.title: worst appp ever

attributes.review: Took weeks to download and when I opened the app it was play the abc’s. I don’t recommend  getting this app or supporting him. He is very racist and only cares about him and his family.😡🤬
attributes.title: 🖤✊🏾Black lives matter✊🏾🖤

attributes.review: I can’t barely even open it without wanting to throw up. Nothing I mean nothing will make me ever like this app unless you were to shock my brain until I had two brain cells left. Please kill me.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: Absolutely horrible. Took an hour to load and couldn’t do anything else while it was loading. It kept kicking me off the app. Overall a really bad app.
attributes.title: don not download!!

attributes.review: I wanted to download the app to support my favorite president but when I opened the app it turned into a porn video of sponge bob and sandy and now I’m grounded because my 7 year old brother was next to me and saw sponge bob and sandy having sex.
attributes.title: Don’t download

attributes.review: This app messed up my phone to the point where it heated up and shut down for a while. This app is also completely useless and it leaves a bad viruses on your phone😡🤬
attributes.title: Dont download this!!!!

attributes.review: When I first downloaded this app my eyes burned with pain, my heart ached with pain and heartbreak. To know that they silence voices just hurts my insides. It’s completely devastating to know that this person takes away our happiness 🤮😭🤯.
attributes.title: Absolutely trash

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what was going on with the president, but this app is very very VERY racist. Not only the app but also the president. This app made my phone glitch and now my phone has a virus. It is a very horrible app and the App Store should eliminate it!!!
attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE.

attributes.review: It took 6 hours to download and all I was trying to do was support the orange face plus my phone kept turning off when I used the app so I think it was a sign from god to delete the app😪
attributes.title: Terrible vibes
